connector.description:
Send messages to an Amazon Simple Queue Service (SQS) queue.

The basic authentication method for the SQS service is to specify an access key and a secret key. These parameters are optional because the Kamelet provides a default credentials provider.

If you use the default credentials provider, the SQS client loads the credentials through this provider and doesn't use the basic authentication method.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.queueNameOrAr.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.queueNameOrArn
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.queueNameOrAr.description: The SQS Queue name or or Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.accessKey.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.accessKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.accessKey.description: The access key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.secretKey.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.secretKey
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.secretKey.description: The secret key obtained from AWS.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.amazonAWSHost.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.amazonAWSHost
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.amazonAWSHost.description: The hostname of the Amazon AWS cloud.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.protocol.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.protocol
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.protocol.description: The underlying protocol used to communicate with SQS. Example: http or https

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.useDefaultCre.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.useDefaultCredentialsProvider
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.useDefaultCre.description: If true, the SQS client loads credentials through a default credentials provider. If false, it uses the basic authentication method (access key and secret key).

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.uriEndpointOv.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.uriEndpointOverride
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.uriEndpointOv.description: The overriding endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also select the `overrideEndpoint` option.

camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.overrideEndpo.name: camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.overrideEndpoint
camel.kamelet.aws-sqs-sink.overrideEndpo.description: Select this option to override the endpoint URI. To use this option, you must also provide a URI for the `uriEndpointOverride` option.
